casebody.data:
W. H. WILSON, Executor of the Estate of Birdine Fletcher, Deceased, et al. v. A. J. SIMLER. No. 4961. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Oct. 12, 1954. J. B. Dudley and Fred E. Suits, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellants. Leslie L. Conner, Arnold B. Britton, James E. Grigsby and Phil E. Daugherty, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

*607Before BRATTON, HUXMAN and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of ap-pellee.
